title: Cities Skylines Free Download Direct Link
description:
Get Cities: Skylines PC game for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRiP
Cities: Skylines is a modern take on the classic city simulation . The game introduces new game play elements to realize the thrill and hardships of creating and maintaining a real city whilst expanding on some well-established tropes of the city building experience. Moreover You’re only limited by your imagination, so take control and reach for the sky Constructing your city from the ground up is easy to learn, but hard to master .
However Playing as the mayor of your city you’ll be faced with balancing essential requirements such as education, water electricity, police, fire fighting, healthcare and much more along with your citys real economy system. Citizens within your city react fluidly, with gravitas and with an air of authenticity to a multitude of game play scenarios. Furthermore Colossal Order’s extensive experience developing the Cities in Motion series is fully utilized in a fully fleshed out and well-crafted local traffic simulation .

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+, 3.2GHz
system_requirements.Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, 512 MB or ATI Radeon HD 5670
